entry.title: Entry for Week 1
entry.content:
This week I have just finish all of my exams so I got a bit behind on the work. But the next couple of weeks I think I can quicken my pace since I will have plenty of time.

What I’ve done this week

  • Downloaded and Installed the App Inventor 2
  • Completed the magic 8 ball tutorial
  • Started to conceive my app for the demo
  • Joined in the kick off hangout and introduced myself to the group
